readable.title: 2824004868_1fc0a81173
readable.content: A girl is outside a house with a pink hula hoop spinning around her upper leg . A girl poses on a shady driveway . A girl stands in a driveway . A young girl stands barefoot on a driveway and uses a hula-hoop . Child playing with a hula hoop on a cement driveway in housing alotment .
